entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mapping unsupported uint in a new db provider ( #33695
  • How can i cancel the asp.net core field plus "s" behavior when I execute complex query #33693

Closed

  • Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33547
    8.0.6

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33694
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #33547 - Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33692
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.6
  • Fix to #33547 - Breaking Change in 8.0.4: System.InvalidOperationException: The data is NULL at ordinal 0. This method can't be called on NULL values. Check using IsDBNull before calling. #33559
